name: Kurakura VS Rangers! - Beta
description:
ID:

Di game ini kamu akan menjadi karakter meme kurakura yang akan membantu desa Sukamundur! Tapi di desa itu ada sosok yang jahat yang akan menghancurkan itu! Namanya Kelompoknya ialah Rangers! Tapi karena kamu akan menjadi pahlawan kamu harus dapat bertahan di desa itu!

En:

In this game you will become a turtle meme character who will help the village of Sukamundur! But in that village there is an evil figure who will destroy it! The team name is Rangers! But since you are going to be a hero you have to be able to survive in that village

⚠Beta Version Warning!⚠

Android Will Not Supporting Next Update!

Beta Update Log:

+Save files, Remove data, and more!

+Sawah

+Terkadang Shop!

+Read full update log here: https://bloo-developer.itch.io/kurakuravsrangers/devlog/417129/kura-kura-vs-rang...

Kurakura VS Rangers Release!

In September 2022!
